This was one of my top favorite Airbnb stays! The location is perfect! The surroundings were beautiful with lots of roses and a neatly manicured property. The instructions on where to park were clearly marked. There was a fun hanging swing for two by the front door of the suite as well as a little nook on the deck to relax with a meal if desired.
The suite itself is awesome, with lots of cool and enjoyable amenities, such as a fantastic antique-looking gas stove fireplace which was easy to use and perfect for some warmth/to get the chill out when the temperatures dipped low at night and in the early morning. I got a kick out of the heated toilet seat and the toilet light too!
The kitchen was charming, and I admired the shower stall nestled between the bathroom and the laundry room--what a cute design! The bed was fantastic--so comfortable. I slept really well. It was a very quick and easy walk to the hotels/casinos as well as the river walk. I hope to be back!
